body:
Hi everyone,
   I am a new Radiance user, currently a student at Penn State, 
currently trying to get Radiance up and running on my mac running os 
10.3


   I don't know exactly what to do in order to set the RAYPATH 
environment variable so that my system knows to look for the radiance 
files in /usr/local/bin


   Could someone put together a beginner level unix user step by step 
list of how this is done. I can't wait to get this working! Thanks.


Ben Hagan
bmh157@psu.edu
___
